notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by Grant Agency for PhD. students and young researchers and pedagogical workers of University of Presov, grant number GaPU 52/2018 (0.2); by Scientific Grant Agency of the Ministry of Education, Science, Research and Sport of the Slovak Republic, grant numbers VEGA 1/0783/18 (0.2); VEGA 2/0013/16 (0.2); and by the ERDF-funded operational program Research and Development, the project code IMTS: 26220220116 (0.2) and ITMS: ITMS 26220120041 (0.2).
